page.title: 07My day - by Nancy McGill
page.content: Married to Robert,with a son,Scott,12, we live on Floor 13 of a 20 storey flat in Sighthill.Robert,a chef,is now unemployed due to ill-health.{15-5-85} Today I rose at 0520 and started work at 0600 at Sighthill Primary School where I am a cleaner.We work to 0900 with a tea-break midway.I breakfasted at 0930 and started housework.Washing is done in an automatic machine.I got ready to go into town where I met friends at 1100 for coffee.At 1215 I left to shop and got home at 1315. After lunch I hung out the washing and sat down to read the paper.Then I pre- pared dinner,a chicken casserole,and returned to work at 1530.Work finished at 1900.After dinner I went to the Snowball Club at St Stephen's Church. We played Bingo,for church funds.Home by 2200,I put Scott's school clothes out and went to bed at 2310.
